info.description:

 | API Documentation |
 |-----|
  |[Electronic Prescription Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/electronic-prescription-service-fhir)|


 | FHIR Implementation Guide | Version |
 |-----|-----|
 |[uk.nhsdigital.r4.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home)||

 |[UKCore.Release1.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home)|1.2.2-prerelease|

get.summary: server-capabilities: Fetch the server FHIR CapabilityStatement

post.description:
This operation accepts a message, processes it according to the definition of the event in the message header, and returns one or more response messages.  

In addition to processing the message event, a server may choose to retain all or some the resources and make them available on a RESTful interface, but is not required to do so.
 Supported Messages 


 prescription-order 
 --------------------
 `https://fhir.nhs.uk/MessageDefinition/prescription-order` 
 Ordering of medications
 

 MessageHeader.eventCoding = **prescription-order** 


 | Resource | Profile | Min | Max | 
|----------|---------|-----|-----| 
| [MedicationRequest](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/MedicationRequest.html) | [NHSDigital-MedicationRequest-Message](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/NHSDigital-MedicationRequest-Message.guide.md) | 1 | 4 | 
| [CommunicationRequest](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/CommunicationRequest.html) | [NHSDigital-CommunicationRequest](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/NHSDigital-CommunicationRequest.guide.md) | 0 | * | 



 prescription-order-update 
 --------------------
 `https://fhir.nhs.uk/MessageDefinition/prescription-order-update` 
 An update to a prescription-order message
 

 MessageHeader.eventCoding = **prescription-order-update** 


 | Resource | Profile | Min | Max | 
|----------|---------|-----|-----| 
| [MedicationRequest](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/MedicationRequest.html) | [NHSDigital-MedicationRequest](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/NHSDigital-MedicationRequest.guide.md) | 1 | 1 | 



 dispense-notification 
 --------------------
 `https://fhir.nhs.uk/MessageDefinition/dispense-notification` 
 Notification of dispensed medication
 

 MessageHeader.eventCoding = **dispense-notification** 


 | Resource | Profile | Min | Max | 
|----------|---------|-----|-----| 
| [MedicationDispense](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/MedicationDispense.html) | [NHSDigital-MedicationDispense-Message](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/NHSDigital-MedicationDispense-Message.guide.md) | 1 | * | 



 dispense-notification-update 
 --------------------
 `https://fhir.nhs.uk/MessageDefinition/dispense-notification-update` 
 Notification of medication dispenses.
 

 MessageHeader.eventCoding = **dispense-notification-update** 


 | Resource | Profile | Min | Max | 
|----------|---------|-----|-----| 
| [MedicationDispense](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/MedicationDispense.html) | [NHSDigital-MedicationDispense-Message](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/NHSDigital-MedicationDispense-Message.guide.md) | 1 | * |

post.description: Convert a prescription in FHIR format into the canonicalised HL7 V3 signature fragments which should be signed by the prescriber.

post.summary: create-type: Create a new Claim instance
post.description: Use this endpoint to submit a claim for reimbursement for a dispensed prescription.

put.summary: update-instance: Update an existing Claim instance, or create using a client-assigned ID
put.description: Use this endpoint to submit a claim for reimbursement for a dispensed prescription.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description:
The short form identifier of the prescription you are searching for.

 | Type | Description | Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|Search for a task instance by its business identifier|Task.identifier|

parameters.name: focus:identifier
parameters.description:
The short form identifier of the prescription you are searching for.

 Caution: This does not appear to be a valid search parameter. Please check Hl7 FHIR conformance.

parameters.name: patient:identifier
parameters.description:
The NHS Number of the patient whose prescriptions you are searching for.

 Caution: This does not appear to be a valid search parameter. Please check Hl7 FHIR conformance.

post.summary: create-type: Create a new Task instance
post.description: Used for returns prescriptions to spine. Should be a PUT
